Translations.Text: soganda che tura (eka parvatanum nama) na
ane lakhavamam avela kitabana
je patali khala upara (lakhayela) che
ane abada gharana
ane unci chatana
ane bhadakavavamam avela samudrana
ni:Sanka tamara palanaharani yatana tha'ine ja rahese
tene ko'i rokanara nathi
je divase akasa tharatharavi uthase
ane parvato calava lagase
te divase juthalavanara'o mate vinasa che
je potana vivadamam uchalakuda kari rahya che
je divase temane du:Kha apine jahannamani aga tarapha khenci lavavamam avase
a ja te jahannamani aga che jene tame juthalavata hata
(have batavo) sum a jadu che? Athava to tame jota ja nathi
ja'o, jahannamamam have tamaru dhiraja rakhavum ane na rakhavum tamara mate sarakhum che. Tamane phakata tamari karanino ja badalo apavamam avase
ni:Sanka sadacari loko jannato ane ne'amatomam che
je temane temana palanahare api che teno ananda la'i rahya che. Anetemana palanahare temane jahannamani yatanathi pana bacavi lidha che
tame masta khata pita raho te karyona badalamam je tame karata hata
kramika pathareli uttama asano upara takiya lagavela. Ane ame temana lagna gori-gori moti ankhovali (huro) sathe kari didha che

Je loko imana lavya ane temani santano'e pana imanamam temanum anusarana karyu, ame temani santanone temana sudhi pahoncadi da'isum ane ame temana karmamanthi ghatado nahim kari'e, dareka vyakti potana karmomam jakadayela che
ame temana mate phalo ane manapasanda gosta puskala pramanamam phelavi da'isum
mojamasti sathe jama (saraba) jhuntavi rahya hase. Je sarabamam na bakavasa hase ane na to papa
ane temani aju baju nana nana balako cali phari rahya hase. Jeva ke te'o moti hata je dhankela rakhya hata
ane andara andara eka-bijathi savala karase
kahese ke a pahela apane potana gharavala'othi khuba ja darata hata
basa! Allaha ta'ala'e amara upara khuba ja upakara karyo ane amane jhadapi garama hava'oni yatanathi bacavi lidha
ame pahelathi ja teni bandagi karata hata, ni:Sanka te upakari ane dayaluche
